props.activeClass: `ActiveClass` is applied when the child component is activated.
props.group: Generally used in [MToolbar](/blazor/components/toolbar) and [MAppbar](/blazor/components/appbar). Removes background color, border and increases space between the buttons
props.mandatory: Force to always select a value (if available).
props.value: The designated model value for the component.
props.values: The designated model value for the component, used with the `Multiple` attribute.

events.valuesChanged: Value change event, available after using the attribute `Multiple`
